title: Learning about leaves
creator_credit: William M. Harlow and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: How leaves are important to plants, animals and humans. Different kids of leaves; how leaves are related to other parts of the plant; the functions of green leaves; the changes that take place through the seasons. Uses time-lapse photography, animation and close-ups.
